name: Fallout: New Vegas - Lonesome Road
description:
Fallout: New Vegas - Lonesome Road is an action-RPG game developed by Obsidian Entertainment. It was originally released in 2011. Bethesda Softworks published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Fallout: New Vegas - Lonesome Road on PC, PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360.
